verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Go <S%H1980><s%> again, <S%H5750><s%> love <S%H157><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> [who] is loved <S%H157><s%> by [her] husband, <S%H7453><s%> yet an adulteress, <S%H5003><s%> even as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> though they turn <S%H6437><s%> to other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> and love <S%H157><s%> raisin <S%H809><s%> <S%H6025><s%> cakes. <S%H809><s%>"
So I bought <S%H3739><s%> her for myself for fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> [shekels] of silver <S%H3701><s%> and a homer <S%H9149><s%> and a half <S%H3963><s%> of barley. <S%H8184><s%>

Then I said <S%H559><s%> to her, "You shall stay <S%H3427><s%> with me for many <S%H7227><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%> You shall not play <S%H2181><s%> the harlot, <S%H2181><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> shall you have <S%H1961><s%> a man; <S%H376><s%> so I will also <S%H1571><s%> be toward <S%H413><s%> you."

For the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will remain <S%H3427><s%> for many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> without <S%H369><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> or prince, <S%H8269><s%> without <S%H369><s%> sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> or [sacred] pillar, <S%H4676><s%> and without <S%H369><s%> ephod <S%H646><s%> or household <S%H8655><s%> idols. <S%H8655><s%>

Afterward <S%H310><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will return <S%H7725><s%> and seek <S%H1245><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> their king; <S%H4428><s%> and they will come <S%H6342><s%> trembling <S%H6342><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and to His goodness <S%H2898><s%> in the last <S%H319><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>
